# Interactive component

<h2>This is the sample2</h2>

<h4>NOTE: If you need to look up and find your district, please refer to [New York City Department of Education Regional Map](https://video.eschoolsolutions.com/udocs/DistrictMap.pdf)</h4>

MANHATTAN: ORANGE

BROOKLYN: BLUE

BRONX: GREEN

QUEENS: PINK

STATEN ISLAND: PURPLE

<meta charset="utf-8">
<style>

.background {
  fill: #eee;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: all;
}

.map-layer {
  fill: #fff;
  stroke: #aaa;
}

.effect-layer{
  pointer-events:none;
}

text{
  font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-weight: 300;
}

text.big-text{
  font-size: 30px;
  font-weight: 400;
}

.effect-layer text, text.dummy-text{
  font-size: 12px;
}

</style>
<body>

<svg></svg>

<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v7.js"></script>
<script>

var width = 960,
    height = 500,
    centered;

// Define color scale
var color = d3.scaleLinear()
  .domain([1, 20])
  .clamp(true)
  .range(['#fff', '#409A99']);

var projection = d3.geoMercator()
  .scale(45000)
  // Center the Map in Colombia
  .center([-73.935242, 40.730610])
  .translate([width / 2, height / 2]);

var path = d3.geoPath()
  .projection(projection);

// Set svg width & height
var svg = d3.select('svg')
  .attr('width', width)
  .attr('height', height);

// Add background
svg.append('rect')
  .attr('class', 'background')
  .attr('width', width)
  .attr('height', height);

var g = svg.append('g');

var effectLayer = g.append('g')
  .classed('effect-layer', true);

var mapLayer = g.append('g')
  .classed('map-layer', true);

const bigText = g.append('text')
  .classed('big-text', true)
  .attr('x', 20)
  .attr('y', 45);

// Load map data
d3.json('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alexjalali/remotelearningedav/main/School%20Districts.geojson').then(function(mapData) {
  var features = mapData.features;

  // Update color scale domain based on data
  color.domain([0, 1]);

  // Draw each province as a path
  mapLayer.selectAll('path')
      .data(features)
    .enter().append('path')
      .attr('d', path)
      .attr('vector-effect', 'non-scaling-stroke')
      .style('fill', fill)
      .on('mouseover', mouseover)
      .on('mouseout', mouseout);
});

// Get province name
function name(d){
  return d.properties.school_dist;
}


function fill(d){
  if(String(name(d)) == "1") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "2") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "3") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "4") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "5") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "6") return "orange";
  if(String(name(d)) == "31") return "purple";
  if(String(name(d)) == "7") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "8") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "9") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "10") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "11") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "12") return "green";
  if(String(name(d)) == "24") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "25") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "26") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "27") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "28") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "29") return "pink";
  if(String(name(d)) == "30") return "pink";
  return color(1);
}

function mouseover(event, d){
  d3.select(this).style('fill', 'yellow');
  
  bigText
    .style('font-family', 'Helvetica Neue')
    .text("District " + String(name(d)));
}

function mouseout(d){
  // Reset province color
  mapLayer.selectAll('path')
    .style('fill', function(d){return centered && d===centered ? '#D5708B' : fill(d);});

  // Remove effect text
  effectLayer.selectAll('text').transition()
    .style('opacity', 0)
    .remove();
}

</script>
